JP, the Ark is on the dark side of the moon.


::Scyther/Incarcinator::

The shuttle slows to a near stop as it gets close to the battle at 
the Ark. He looks back at the other two Predacons on board.

"Allrighty, guys. Here are a few Maxis for us to kick. They're allied 
with the Maxis that busted our group and got us all in prison. 
There's Killfest."

He points out the viewscreen at Killfest, and then the hatch opens. 
Scyther jumps out, activating his cloak and approaching the battle. 
Incarcinator follows behind.





--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> ThunderCracker had finally made it to Earth. He landed his tiny 
ship and looked around himself. He wondered if anyone on this planet 
were fighting, and then he thought about how nice it would be if 
there was no more fighting. He had done his fair share of it, and 
would much like to retire, yet live peacefully in a peaceful 
universe, but to do that he had to end the war between Maximal and 
Predacon. He looked around the landscape for any nearby friends or 
foes...
> 
> Pinsir was aboard Scyther's ship, and was waiting to 
join...the...Predacons... (Hint hint, Zardus!)
